_sText:
This is my first map.

- size : 17.2Mo
- number of faces : 36825 (35929 in beta1)
- number of props (dynamic, static and phys) : 797 (865 in beta1)
- number of entity point (without props, env_cubemap and weapon) : 742 (1031 in beta1)
- FPS min see : 40
- FPS max see : 140

no env_cubemap (for now)

---------------------
>>NeMe$is[FR]<<
---------------------

Update :

*** beta1 *** 18/07/2008 13:25 : 
- fix nuke bug.
- .rar fixed, now the download is working ;)

*** beta2 *** 24/07/2008 15:00 :
- reduction of the second room.
- NO BUYZONE, just compact pistol (p228) and knife at spawn.
- some smokegrenade and 3 different weapons are recoverable in the first and second room (galil, famas and ump65), in the 3rd room all weapon wait you ;)
- when you are outside : some p90, mp5navy and grenade wait you !
- when you are in the terrace (where you get the helicopter) some pumpgun (xm1014 and m3) and grenade wait you !
- all the doors are oppening 2 minutes after the map spawn.
- elevator in the self-destruction room fixed !

*** v1 *** 05/08/2008 16:00 :
-elevator of the room 3 corrected
-2 corridors deleted (spawn ct and t, corridor at the center - first floor)
-changing of the guns room under the room 3 (textures changed)
-textures of the walls, ceilings and the floor of the room 3 changed
-Textures and Lighting of the elevators room changed (for the 3 levels)
-Global changement of the textures for the room 1
-weapons dispenser added at the room1
-Lighting changement at the room 1
-room1: add platform in the center for weapon disturbing
-boats optimized
-lengthening the gap time for the opening of doors
-Adding jib and "exit" panels, for know where the player must going
-geometry of the corridors for leaving the 1rst room (after the stairs) change
-all restricted weapons are deleted, smokegrenade and flashbang too
-weapons provision change in the map, showcase are replaced by dispenser (take less ressources)
-some "props" are deleted in the map.
-shadow's helicopter deleted (Primary responsibility of the lagg when he left the terrace)
-nuke attack forced (midway through the route taken by helicopter when he leave the terrace)
